message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us both to benefit.
I think a 55/45 split in my favor is fair, considering the inflation rate will affect your share more than mine. Let's get this done.
That's a very cheeky offer, Bob. Let's be more realistic. We still have time.
Okay, Bob, let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to adjust my initial offer slightly. 52/48 -  it's a deal that considers the time pressure and gives us both a good share.
